name: Silvia Domcke
bio: Silvia is an Assistant Professor at the University of Zurich. Her scientific journey took her to the Technical University of Munich, Harvard Medical School in Boston, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York, the FMI in Basel, and the University of Washington in Seattle. From bench to byte, this included an excursion into the world of Silicon Valley biotech, leading a computational team at a drug discovery start-up.
extra: Silvia's love for adventures and exploring the unknown goes beyond science: she's also a passionate ski mountaineer, alpine climber and wilderness bushwhacker.
